title: Looking for a Ranked team that plays basically every day
body:
Hey! If you're reading this thanks! So as i said in the title i'm looking for a ranked team that constantly plays. I can play adc,sup and mid really well. I'm currently in Gold so if you're interested in recruiting me add my league account: Et3rnal
Looking forward to playing with you!

replies.body:
Hey man I have a thread and I'm looking for gold/plat players and I would be interested to let you on the team 

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/MIAPlElt-looking-for-goldplat-players-from-season-4-and-willing-to-start-a-semi-serious-ranked-team

As i read the title.

m8, you play everyday...oh wait i do too.
